pull.title: Release notes about mining code changes
pull.body:
@laanwj I made this a new PR since it seemed you were about to merge the other one

@MarcoFalke hopefully this won't conflict with yours

events.body: ACK b3926a2. Does not conflict with mine.

events.message: Add comment about mining changes and more about priority

events.body:
@laanwj I rebased this since you merged the prior PR, but then it occurred to me that maybe I shouldn't have b/c the ACK's don't line up.  Please let me know what you prefer for the future.
Anyway, its the same text that was ACK'ed
@morcos If this was only a rebase, you can just do `git reset --hard b3926a2;git push <> -f` and GitHub will show it lined up. (b3926a2 is already rebased on the latest content)
